sentences.sContent: He eventually escaped and made his way back to England.
sentences.sCn: 他终于逃脱并返回英格兰。

sentences.sContent: Eventually, she got a job and moved to London.
sentences.sCn: 最终，她找到了工作并移居伦敦。

words.tran: 最后的，结果的；可能的；终于的

trans.tranOther: after a long time, or after a lot of things have happened
